name: Redemption Cemetery: At Death's Door Hidden (Full)
name_original: Redemption Cemetery: At Death's Door Hidden (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

When your late-night cab ride takes a dangerous turn, you literally find yourself at death’s door. Becoming stranded at a cemetery is bad, but far worse is being trapped there forever with the restless dead. Something is tormenting the souls there, denying them the peace they so rightfully deserve. Can you survive the night, or will you become trapped here forever?

• RELEASE THE KEEPER OF THE CEMETERY!
This guardian was imprisoned here long ago by some evil spirit. They’ll need to be freed first, if you’re ever going to make it out of here alive!

• CAN YOU GET REDEMPTION FOR THE TORTURED SOULS?
Enter the past of each ghost through creepy hidden object scenes.

• RESTORE THE NATURAL ORDER OF LIFE AND DEATH
Bring balance back to the world by solving haunted puzzles and ominous mini-games.

• UNEARTH MORE HAUNTED HISTORY IN THE CHILLING BONUS CHAPTER
Continue this dark adventure and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Clocks, special achievements, and more!
